txt.en: 'Thou hast come to the end, fools...no small task.'
'Now, however, thou shalt feel the true might of the spirits of the dread mists!'
'To me, darkwater!'
'Come, defend this ground!'
'Well fought! No one bests the Wardens of Annúminas!'
'Surprising, thou hast survived the test... perhaps we shall yet meet in combat!'
'Now is the time for triumph!'
Glinghant
A loud bang echoes off the walls of the gardens as the levers flip back...
'So, thou hast solved the first riddle. Wilt thou dare pull the lever before thee?'
'Dost thou possess the endurance to pass the second test?'
'Why do you hide, cowards? Show yourselves!'
Clorhir - Warden Controlled
'Do you fear the Warden's hand, Angmarim?'
'Come and face us. We are but mere Men!'
'I do so wish for a fight.'
The Wardens of Annúminas must control Clorhir.
'Well done! A victory for the Wardens of Annúminas!'
In the distance, the sound of gates opening is heard....
Annúminas
Clorhir - Invader Controlled
'They have defeated the Wardens! Fly! Fly!'
Hi!
Nengon cackles, 'Surprising, thou hast survived the test... perhaps we shall yet meet in combat!'
'So be it! Thou wilt not withstand this trial!'
'Wardens of Annúminas, we hold here!'
